forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain early tapering to showers and becoming mixed with snow late. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Evening rain followed by a mix of rain and snow showers late. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 100%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 27F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Temps nearly steady around 30. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 70%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early will become steadier snow overnight. Low 26F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 80%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.
